text: 5.20 Sng 51.13, Snd 10.12, Lom 11.14, 1 Ko 9.22, 1 Ti 4.16, 1 Pi 4.8 ak tep yɨbɨl gɨpɨm. Anɨb ak nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb. Bɨ olap tap si tap tɨmel gɨl, takaw yɨpɨl yɨbɨl ak kelɨgek, nɨbi amɨl nop agñɨ tep gem adɨkɨd ownɨgab ak, nɨbi bɨ anɨb ak nop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨgabɨm. God tap si tap tɨmel tɨtay gak okok tɨg walɨg gɨyokek, kumɨl pɨsnep ma kumnɨgab.
